if (c.playerAncientMagics == 0) {
to something the brings it back to the first slide like another example would be
if (c.playerQuestTab == 0) { i dont know if thats it but i need someone to tell me what to change it too.

please i need help with this

Read full topic

item.title: Help with quest tab
item.dc:creator: @ServerMuncher ServerMuncher
item.description:
@ServerMuncher wrote:

case 17111: c.closeInterface(); if (c.playerAncientMagics == 0) { c.setSidebarInterface(2, 1151); } if (c.playerAncientMagics == 1) { c.setSidebarInterface(2, 12855); }

I think that code is for changing spell books, not for the minigame…

Read full topic

basically this is the scenario…

problem.jpg749×351

I want it when u click to show the quest tab with what was in the first slide… instead it shows ancient magics i want when u click stop viewing to go the the first slide and not the last i know where to edit it but dont know what to put…
i know when u click the stop viewing the coding to return to the ancient tab is this
c.playerAncientMagics i need to know what the code is to return to the quest tab…

item.title: Help with quest tab
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

setSidebarInterface(2, 638);

[font=courier]That sets Tab 2 (Quest tab) back to the correct interface.[/font]

Read full topic

@Punkzombie wrote:

thanks but thats not what i meant i meant as if… the c.playerAncientMagics tab open ancient magics when ur done with this but i need to know what it is to open quest tab when ur done with it like c.playerQuest (i dont know what it is) but im looking for help and i will also be using that command u made so thanks

item.title: Help with quest tab
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]I cannot really understand your question but thats probably due to me being extremely tired. In attempt to trying to see the result I came up with this

if(command.startsWith("magik")) { setSidebarInterface(2,12855); sM("Ancient Magic is on"); }

[font=courier]Maybe it is an easier way to go about your problem. Just there is multiple checks for playerAncientMagics and this one is guaranteed no bullshit. PS: This makes the Quest tab the ancient magik book and leaves the normal magic book unaffected so you can use both… is this right?[/font]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with quest tab
item.dc:creator: @Punkzombie Punkzombie
item.description:
@Punkzombie wrote:

i have the coding

case 17111: c.closeInterface(); if (c.playerAncientMagics == 0) { c.setSidebarInterface(2, 1151); } if (c.playerAncientMagics == 1) { c.setSidebarInterface(2, 12855); }
c.setSidebarInterface is what i already set to make it pop up in the quest area…
but the c.playerAncientMagics makes it end up in the ancient magics mage book and u cant get rid of it… so i need to know what the one for returning to the quest tab one

an example c.playAncientMagics ==1) { makes u end up in the ancient magics if the 1 is a 0 u dont but this is what i need
c.(quest stuff) ==1)
i need that so please help i know this is hard to understand

Read full topic
